About.Hours & facilities: Open Sun 2-5pm and by appointment; closed December and January. General reference assistance available. Copying services available for books, journals, original records to A3, photographs, newspapers, maps and plans. Referral to paid researchers is available. Introductory brochure available.

About.Access: One week's advance notice of visit required.

About.Acquisition focus: Any material relating to the history of Heidelberg and district and on persons associated with the district. Particular reference is made to the Heidelberg School of Artists.
